title: The weak deduction theorem for propositional calculus
content: This subsection contains a few results related to the weak deduction theorem in propositional calculus. For the weak deduction theorem in set theory, see the section beginning with ~ dedth . For more information on the weak deduction theorem, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html .

blocks.name: elimh
blocks.content: Hypothesis builder for the weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) Commute consequent. (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 27-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimh(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- w0
  -| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w0, w4))
  -| w4
} = {
  pm2.61i(w0, w1)
  ibir(w1, w0)
  syl(w1, wb(w0, w1), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2))
  ifptru(w1, w2, w3)
  mpbiri(wn(w1), w0, w4)
  syl(wn(w1), wb(w0, w4), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3))
  ifpfal(w1, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elimh(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ w0
  ⊣ ((if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w2)→(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ ((if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w3)→(w0 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ w4
} = {
  pm2.61i(w0, w1)
  ibir(w1, w0)
  syl(w1, (w0 ↔ w1), (if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w2))
  ifptru(w1, w2, w3)
  mpbiri(¬ w1, w0, w4)
  syl(¬ w1, (w0 ↔ w4), (if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w3))
  ifpfal(w1, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: elimhOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ elimh as of 27-Apr-2023. Hypothesis builder for the weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimhOLD(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- w0
  -| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w4, w0))
  -| w4
} = {
  pm2.61i(w0, w1)
  ibi(w1, w0)
  syl(w1, wb(w1, w0), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2))
  ifptru(w1, w2, w3)
  mpbii(wn(w1), w0, w4)
  syl(wn(w1), wb(w4, w0), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3))
  ifpfal(w1, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elimhOLD(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ w0
  ⊣ ((if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w2)→(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ ((if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w3)→(w4 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w4
} = {
  pm2.61i(w0, w1)
  ibi(w1, w0)
  syl(w1, (w1 ↔ w0), (if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w2))
  ifptru(w1, w2, w3)
  mpbii(¬ w1, w0, w4)
  syl(¬ w1, (w4 ↔ w0), (if(w1, w2, w3)↔ w3))
  ifpfal(w1, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: dedt
blocks.content: The weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) Commute consequent. (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 27-Apr-2023.)

blocks.name: dedtOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ dedt as of 27-Apr-2023. The weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: con3ALT
blocks.content: Proof of ~ con3 from its associated inference ~ con3i that illustrates the use of the weak deduction theorem ~ dedt . (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) Revised ~ dedt and ~ elimh . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 27-Apr-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: con3ALTOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ con3ALT as of 27-Apr-2023. Proof of ~ con3 from its associated inference ~ con3i that illustrates the use of the weak deduction theorem ~ dedt . (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm con3ALTOLD(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)))
} = {
  dedtOLD(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)), w1, w0, wi(wn(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0)), wn(w0)))
  imbi1d(wb(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w1), wn(w1), wn(w0), wn(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0)))
  notbid(wb(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w1), w1, wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0))
  con3i(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w0)
  elimhOLD(wi(w0, wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0)), wi(w0, w1), w1, w0, wi(w0, w0))
  imbi2d(wb(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w1), w0, w1, wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0))
  bicom1(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w1)
  imbi2d(wb(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w0), w0, w0, wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0))
  bicom1(wif(wi(w0, w1), w1, w0), w0)
  id(w0)
}
